intro: Monotes dawei, commonly known as the Chinese dawei, is a flowering plant native to southern China. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its tubular flowers that range in color from white to pink. The plant typically grows as an evergreen shrub, reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a smooth texture. It prefers moist, well-drained soil and partial shade, making it a suitable candidate for shaded garden environments.
